1d_json_string0.name: 1D JSON String
1d_json_string0.desc:
1 Dimensional JSON string of data to be merged. This Does not delete existing data. It will only update or add to existing.

Example {"field1":"value1","field2":"value2"}

3d_json_string0.name: 3D JSON String

Example {"table1":{"list1":{"field1":"value1","field2":"value2"},"list2":{"field1":"value1","field2":"value2"}}}
